pages.text: Bows are a great way of harming enemies from afar, but it requires quite a bit of practice to become consistent at hitting things, especially if they are moving, and arrows are not always in good supply.$(br2)When the High Council tasked us with creating a bow that did not need arrows, we immediately set to work, believing transmutation could hold answers.

We eventually created the Archangel's Smite, a ring that consumes fuel items to conjure and automatically aim arrows. Simply swinging the ring fires a volley of arrows, using the ring fires a single one, and pressing the change mode key toggles a constant stream.
